com.mjun.mtransition

类 MTranstionUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mjun.mtransition.MTranstionUtil

  • public class MTranstionUtil
extends java.lang.Object

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      MTranstionUtil() 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void removeActivityAnimation(android.app.Activity activity)
      在启动Activity或者关闭Activity，如果需要做MTransition动画时，需要在Activity.startActivity(Intent) 或者 Activity.finish()调用之后，调用该方法，来关闭默认的Activity动画
      static void removeActivityCloseAnimation(android.app.Activity activity)
      因为Android默认会给Activity启动和关闭的动画，这会与MTranstion的动画冲突，所以需要在必要的时候去掉Android的默认动画 一般情况下，会在FromPage的MTransitionPage.setContainer(View, ITransitPrepareListener)主动调用一次 Because Android defaults to the Activity start and close animation, this will conflict with the MTranstion animation, so you need to remove the Android default Activity animation when necessary In general, it will be invoked once in FromPage's MTransitionPage.setContainer(View, ITransitPrepareListener)
      static void removeActivityOpenAnimation(android.app.Activity activity)
      因为Android默认会给Activity启动和关闭的动画，这会与MTranstion的动画冲突，所以需要在必要的时候去掉Android的默认动画 一般情况下，会在ToPage的MTransitionPage.setContainer(View, ITransitPrepareListener)主动调用一次 Because Android defaults to the Activity start and close animation, this will conflict with the MTranstion animation, so you need to remove the Android default Activity animation when necessary In general, it will be invoked once in ToPage's MTransitionPage.setContainer(View, ITransitPrepareListener)
      static void resumeActivityAnimation(android.app.Activity activity)
      恢复Activity默认的启动关闭动画 Restore Activity default animation

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 方法详细资料

      • removeActivityCloseAnimation

        public static void removeActivityCloseAnimation(android.app.Activity activity)
        因为Android默认会给Activity启动和关闭的动画，这会与MTranstion的动画冲突，所以需要在必要的时候去掉Android的默认动画 一般情况下，会在FromPage的MTransitionPage.setContainer(View, ITransitPrepareListener)主动调用一次 Because Android defaults to the Activity start and close animation, this will conflict with the MTranstion animation, so you need to remove the Android default Activity animation when necessary In general, it will be invoked once in FromPage's MTransitionPage.setContainer(View, ITransitPrepareListener)
        参数:
        activity -

      • removeActivityOpenAnimation

        public static void removeActivityOpenAnimation(android.app.Activity activity)
        因为Android默认会给Activity启动和关闭的动画，这会与MTranstion的动画冲突，所以需要在必要的时候去掉Android的默认动画 一般情况下，会在ToPage的MTransitionPage.setContainer(View, ITransitPrepareListener)主动调用一次 Because Android defaults to the Activity start and close animation, this will conflict with the MTranstion animation, so you need to remove the Android default Activity animation when necessary In general, it will be invoked once in ToPage's MTransitionPage.setContainer(View, ITransitPrepareListener)
        参数:
        activity -

      • resumeActivityAnimation

        public static void resumeActivityAnimation(android.app.Activity activity)
        恢复Activity默认的启动关闭动画 Restore Activity default animation
        参数:
        activity -
        另请参阅:
        removeActivityCloseAnimation(Activity), removeActivityOpenAnimation(Activity)

      • removeActivityAnimation

        public static void removeActivityAnimation(android.app.Activity activity)
        在启动Activity或者关闭Activity，如果需要做MTransition动画时，需要在Activity.startActivity(Intent) 或者 Activity.finish()调用之后，调用该方法，来关闭默认的Activity动画
        参数:
        activity -
